alert.note: Alert for Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 09 at 11:30AM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Lafayette, northeastern Dixie, northeastern Taylor and southeastern Madison Counties through 1230 PM EST... At 1129 AM EST, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Suwannee River State Park to near Dowling Park to 7 miles southeast of Perry to 26 miles northwest of Steinhatchee. Movement was east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Mayo, Perry, Lee, Pinland, Buckville, Grady, Hatch Bend, Foley, Salem, Perry-Foley Airport, San Pedro Junction, Hampton Springs, Cooks Hammock, Chancey, Smith, Carbur, Alton, Fletcher Springs, Mayo Junction and Townsend. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 100 PM EST for Big Bend of Florida.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Taylor; Inland Dixie; Inland Taylor; Lafayette; Madison
